description.p: AeroFTP is a modern FTP client built with Tauri that combines beauty and functionality. It offers a sleek interface with powerful features for managing your FTP connections.

ul.li: Multi-language support - English, Italian, Spanish, French, Chinese
Fast transfers with real-time progress monitoring
AeroCloud file synchronization
Beautiful, modern dark/light themes
Dual-pane file browser for local and remote files
File synchronization with conflict detection
Integrated DevTools with Monaco code editor, terminal, and AI chat
Built-in media player and image preview
Multi-session tabs with connection caching
Secure FTPS connection profiles
Keyboard shortcuts for power users
Activity Log Panel with FileZilla-style real-time logging

description.p: Built with Rust (Tauri) and React/TypeScript. Open source under GPL-3.0 license.

screenshot.caption: AeroFTP main window showing dual-pane file browser

ul.li: WebDAV support - Nextcloud, ownCloud, and any WebDAV server
S3 support - AWS S3, MinIO, Backblaze B2, Cloudflare R2
Protocol selector in connection screen
AeroCloud sync now works with any provider
New unified storage provider architecture
Cleaner logo without shadow effects
Fixed DevTools terminal keyboard input
Improved terminal styling with GitHub Dark theme
Colored shell prompt (green user@host, blue path)
Updated plugin versions for compatibility
Per-session navigation sync - each tab maintains independent sync state
Path coherence check - warning when local/remote paths don't match
AeroCloud log filter - toggle to hide/show cloud sync messages
Tab switch logging - reconnection status in Activity Log
Fixed local path not restoring on tab switch

description.p: Activity Log Panel release with major improvements:

ul.li: Activity Log Panel with FileZilla-style real-time logging
Dual theme system: Professional (Tokio Night) and Cyber (neon glow)
Humanized log messages in 5 languages
Badge counter in StatusBar showing log count
Multi-tab switching bug fixed
Keep-alive timeout and reconnection logging
Added Spanish, French, and Simplified Chinese languages
English now default language
Hidden files (dotfiles) now visible by default
